examples.original: Patient prescribed 50mg Atenolol PO q.d. for hypertension. Monitor for bradycardia.
examples.expected_simplified: Take 50mg of Atenolol by mouth once a day for high blood pressure. Watch out for slow heart rate.

examples.original: Administer 10 units insulin subcutaneously b.i.d. before meals. Check blood glucose q.i.d. Target range 80-120 mg/dL.
examples.expected_simplified: Give 10 units of insulin under the skin twice a day before meals. Check blood sugar four times a day. Keep it between 80-120 mg/dL.

examples.original: Patient received 2mg Morphine IV q4h PRN for pain. Maintain SBP >90 mmHg. Monitor O2 sat, keep >92%.
examples.expected_simplified: Give 2mg of Morphine into a vein every 4 hours as needed for pain. Keep blood pressure above 90 mmHg. Watch oxygen levels, keep above 92%.

examples.original: Start Metoprolol 25mg PO b.i.d. for atrial fibrillation. Hold if HR <60 bpm or SBP <100 mmHg.
examples.expected_simplified: Start taking 25mg of Metoprolol by mouth twice a day for irregular heartbeat. Don't take it if heart rate is below 60 beats per minute or blood pressure is below 100 mmHg.

examples.original: Albuterol inhaler 2 puffs q4-6h PRN for dyspnea. If no improvement after 3 doses, seek emergency care.
examples.expected_simplified: Use 2 puffs of Albuterol inhaler every 4-6 hours as needed for shortness of breath. If you don't feel better after 3 doses, go to the emergency room.

examples.original: Warfarin 5mg PO q.d. for DVT prophylaxis. Monitor INR weekly, target 2-3. Avoid NSAIDs and alcohol.
examples.expected_simplified: Take 5mg of Warfarin by mouth once a day to prevent blood clots. Get blood test (INR) checked weekly, goal is 2-3. Don't take pain relievers like ibuprofen or drink alcohol.

examples.original: Amoxicillin 500mg PO t.i.d. x 7 days for sinusitis. Complete full course even if symptoms improve.
examples.expected_simplified: Take 500mg of Amoxicillin by mouth three times a day for 7 days for your sinus infection. Finish all the medicine even if you feel better.

examples.original: Levothyroxine 100mcg PO q.d. on empty stomach for hypothyroidism. TSH to be checked in 6 weeks.
examples.expected_simplified: Take 100mcg of Levothyroxine by mouth once a day on an empty stomach for underactive thyroid. Get thyroid blood test checked in 6 weeks.
